    ARCLE: The Abstract and Reasoning Corpus Learning Environment for Reinforcement Learning
    

    
      
    Hosung Lee*, Sejin Kim*, Seungpil Lee, Sanha Hwang, Jihwan Lee, Byung-Jun Lee†, and Sundong Kim†
    

    
    
    
    
      
    In CoLLAs, 2024, 2024
